title: Great British Bake Off's Paul Hollywood strips off for topless sunbathing session

Celebrity chef Paul Hollywood gave a glimpse of his super hot bod while sunbathing topless ahead of tonight's final.

The silver fox, 53, shared a candid snap of himself chilling in the sun, with his eyes closed and baring his chest to the camera.

Making his fans jealous, the star wrote: "Catching some rays..." with a smiley emoji.

They then went on to compliment the Bake Off judge, flooding him with flame emojis and sweet comments.

One cheeky fan said: "NO ONE is complaining though," suggesting Paul's topless picture was a treat for the eyes.

His rare chilled out selfie comes just a day before the Bake Off final - which will see Steph Blackwell, David Atherton and Alice Fevronia battle it out to be crowned the winner in TV's most iconic large tent.

(Image: Instagram)

Judge Paul will be joined by Prue Leith, 79, to help him choose the lucky winner.

He admitted that picking the winner of this year's show was the toughest task of his TV career – and went right down to the wire.

The show judge celebrates his 500th challenge during tonight's final, but the wealth of experience didn't make it any easier to choose between Steph, David and Alice.

(Image: Instagram)

His ex girlfriend Summer Monteys-Fullam recently compared her family to Kim Kardashian and Ko after they jetted back from a plush holiday.

The barmaid, 24, had been spamming her Instagram account with photos from her sun-kissed trip to Cyprus, which she went on with her glam mum Sabina, her sisters and dad.

She filmed as her Ryanair flight landed back in the UK, captioning the post: "The Kent Kardashians are back."

Her comment was clearly meant to be tongue in cheek as she posted two cry laughing emojis alongside it.

*The Great British Bake Off: The Final, Channel 4, Tuesday, 8pm
